thread.title: An 18th and 50th Birthday Celebration
thread.title_full: An 18th and 50th Birthday Celebration - Review of The Westin New York at Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: kevin s
title: An 18th and 50th Birthday Celebration
text:
Stayed at the Wetin Times Square
A perfectly situated base for sight seeing
Had a very nice welcome, The rooms were spacious and very clean,
would definately recommend this Hotel and would return again in the future.
Thanks to the staff who were all very helpful
